item.title: Soft H1, but large acquisition to drive earnings: LAIQON's soft H1 results were offset by a significant ...
item.author: FN FinanzNachrichten.de
item.description: Last week, LAIQON released soft H1 results but issued a new mid-term guidance following a large AuM acquisition. In detail: Despite 8% yoy higher AuM, reported H1 sales came in muted and declined by 4% yoy to € 14.2m mainly due to the planned phase-out of sold business units (€ -0.4m sales effect). ...

item.title: Les gérants crédit abordent la rentrée sous tension
item.author: L'AGEFI Quotidien (éd. de 7 heures)
item.description:
Le Panel Crédit de LAgefi n'est plus aussi enthousiaste qu'à la veille de la période estivale. Si les fondamentaux et les flux de capitaux demeurent des soutiens solides, les valorisations inquiètent.
Le Panel Crédit de L ' A g e avait abordé la période estivale
